Articles.Content:
Evening all; I'm wondering if there are any up to date mods which have a decent solution for my self-created problem. I want to take all the original four kerbals on a mission because OCD, but my current selection of mod and stock parts don't really have a way of doing things that works for my lander.

All my brainstorming designs either are some combination of the below

1) A bit on the heavy side 2) Don't have a decent form factor (too long and prone to tipping over, just plain ugly etc) 3) Split my kerbals up into unpleasing groups (ie not 2 or 4, although I'd rather not split at all if I can help it)

I'd prefer a 2.5 form factor, but it's really not essential I suppose ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So in short I'm hoping there's a mod somewhere that I've missed that has a decent 4-person pod. Thank you anyone who can point me in the right direction ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There are some that hold 6 that you can cut back to 4 ?

EDIT- You can edit the cfg for the pod you want to hold 4 but might bug if you change view to a kerbal that don't have one.

The best that I would recommend is what MeCripp said. Taurus HCV is a wonderful pack that has a large capacity cockpit. Edit the CFG to rescale it to the right size and then turn down the number of kerbals it can fit. I am sure that there are other high capacity capsules out there, but I like good ole Taurus
Necrobone made one. But it still looks a bit flat and lacks an IVA: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130517](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130517)

Thanks for the help ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). The only 6 crew pods I have are from Near Future's station parts, and are a bit of a strange size/shape heh ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Downloading Taurus and seeing if that'll do the job ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). I suppose there isn't much demand for 4 capacity pods, as 3 will give you one of each class. But dammit I don't want to leave anyone behind xD.

there is also a 6-kerbal pod,the Super 100 Shooting Star Command Pod, here. [https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/904/Super%20100%20Shooting%20Star%20Command%20Pod](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/904/Super%20100%20Shooting%20Star%20Command%20Pod)
